title: Michael Saylor's Strategy Hangs on to Spot in Nasdaq 100 Index
contentSnippet: The annual Nasdaq 100 rebalance saw six companies dropped and three new additions, with changes taking effect on December 22, but bitcoin treasury company Strategy hung onto its spot.

title: Vanguard Exec Likens Bitcoin to ‘Digital Labubu’ Even as Firm Opens ETF Trading Access
contentSnippet: Executive John Ameriks emphasized Vanguard's core view of the crypto sector hasn't changed, seeing the asset class as highly speculative.

title: After 2025’s Test Run, Crypto IPOs Face Their Real Trial in 2026
contentSnippet: "2026 is where we find out if crypto IPOs are a durable asset class," according to Laura Katherine Mann, a partner at global law firm White & Case.

title: Tether’s Bid to Buy Italian Soccer Club Juventus Rejected by Majority Shareholder Exor
contentSnippet: The stablecoin giant, which currently has a 10% stake in Juventus, recently offered to buy out the Agnelli family’s 65.4% stake in an all-cash deal.

title: NFT Project Pudgy Penguins Takes Over Las Vegas Sphere in Holiday Campaign
contentSnippet: The NFT brand’s animated segments will air on the Sphere across Christmas week, signaling the crypto company's move into real-world consumer markets.

title: MSCI Isn't Wrong to Be Cautious on DATs
contentSnippet: As leading index provider MSCI considers excluding digital asset treasuries (DATs) from its suite of indexes, it’s worth considering the risk profile of these investment vehicles to determine if they

title: Brazil’s Largest Asset Manager Recommends Investors Put Up to 3% of their Money in Bitcoin to Hedge Against FX, Market Shocks
contentSnippet: The recommendation is in line with other global asset managers like BlackRock and Bank of America suggesting small portfolio allocations to the largest cryptocurrency.

title: State of Crypto: Policymakers Dominated Most Influential 2025
contentSnippet: CoinDesk is unveiling its annual list of the individuals who have shaped the crypto industry and the discourse around it this year.

title: Bank of Japan Set to Hike Rates to 30-Year High, Posing Another Threat to Bitcoin
contentSnippet: Rising Japanese rates and a stronger yen threaten carry trades and could pressure crypto markets despite easing U.S. policy.

title: Crypto’s Machine Learning ‘iPhone Moment’ Comes Closer as AI Agents Trade the Market
contentSnippet: Recall Labs, a firm that has run 20 or so AI trading arenas, pitted foundational large language models (LLMs) against customized trading agents.

title: Fogo cancels $20 million pre-sale, will airdrop tokens instead in upcoming mainnet launch
contentSnippet: Fogo will airdrop the tokens set aside for a pre-sale next week, a change in strategy to better distribute tokens and reward early users.

title: Vanguard Exec Calls Bitcoin a 'Digital Labubu', Even as Firm Offers Crypto ETF Trading
contentSnippet: The Vanguard equity head dismissed Bitcoin as speculative, though the firm still expanded client access to crypto ETFs.

title: These Bleak Victim Letters Helped Seal Terra Founder Do Kwon's Fate
contentSnippet: The judge said the victim letters, which detailed the personal impact of the Terra collapse, were “impactful”—before sentencing Do Kwon to 15 years in prison.

title: Crypto giant Tether offers to buy famous Italian football club Juventus
contentSnippet: Tether, already a minority shareholder in Juventus, is "prepared to invest 1 billion Euros in the support and development of the club."

title: Crypto Giant Tether Makes Offer to Acquire Juventus Soccer Club
contentSnippet: Stablecoin firm Tether is making a bid to acquire the famed Serie A Italian soccer club, Juventus, after previously taking a minority share.

title: Coinbase Preps Prediction Market, Tokenized Equities Launch for December 17: Report
contentSnippet: Crypto exchange Coinbase is set to launch its own prediction market as they surge in both popularity and scrutiny.

title: DeFi groups fire back against Citadel Securities’ call for ‘flawed’ SEC tokenization rules
contentSnippet: DeFi proponents are pushing back against Citadel Securities' stance that the SEC should impose stricter rules on DeFi.

title: XRP Is Launching on Ethereum and Solana—Here's Why (and How)
contentSnippet: The Ripple-linked XRP will soon be usable in DeFi on other major layer-1 networks like Solana and Ethereum. Here's how.

title: Moody’s proposes stablecoin ratings framework focused on reserve quality
contentSnippet: The credit ratings agency has asked market participants to comment on its proposed framework by January 26.

title: Phantom Crypto Wallet Adds Kalshi Prediction Markets for Over 20 Million Users
contentSnippet: Prediction markets are increasingly being integrated directly within crypto wallets, with Phantom and Kalshi revealing the latest team-up.

title: The Daily: Ripple, Circle and BitGo win conditional approval for US banking charters, Hex Trust to issue and custody wrapped XRP, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: Jump Crypto’s Firedancer hits Solana mainnet as the network aims to unlock 1 million TPS
contentSnippet: Firedancer could boost client diversity on Solana, which historically has been dominated by forks of Solana Labs' original codebase.

title: New AI Tool Promises to Decode—And Replicate—Social Video Virality
contentSnippet: The startup says its AI can analyze viral videos and generate optimized remixes, though evidence beyond early demos remains limited.

title: Solo Bitcoin Miner Beats the Odds, Winning $282K Reward
contentSnippet: A solo Bitcoin miner defied the odds and won a block reward worth around $282,000 with the help of mining service, Solo CKPool.

title: Sorry Gooners: OpenAI's Erotic ChatGPT Delayed Into 2026
contentSnippet: Sam Altman breaks his December promise as OpenAI delays ChatGPT's adult content feature into at least Q1 next year.

title: Tether Considers Tokenizing Stock Amid $20 Billion Fundraise: Bloomberg
contentSnippet: Stablecoin issuer Tether moved to prevent equity sales as Bloomberg reports plans to raise funds at a $500 billion valuation.

title: Ripple, Circle and BitGo secure conditional approval for US banking charters
contentSnippet: Coinbase , Stripe-owned Bridge and Crypto.com have also applied to become federally chartered banks in the U.S.

title: Aave community probes CoW Swap integration and Aave Labs ‘stealth privatization’ of protocol
contentSnippet: An Aave governance dispute has erupted after a delegate claimed that swap fees from Aave Labs’ new CoWSwap integration no longer reach the DAO treasury.

title: Pyth launches token buyback program, allocating 33% of DAO treasury to monthly PYTH purchases
contentSnippet: The buybacks are funded by network revenue as Pyth reports rising traction, with its Pyth Pro product surpassing $1M ARR in its first month.

title: Lucky solo bitcoin miner beats 1-in-82-year odds to win $285,000 block reward
contentSnippet: The bitcoin miner earned $284,633 for mining block 927,474 on Thursday using CKpool in a solo mining configuration.

title: NFT winter deepens: Monthly sales hit lowest point of the year
contentSnippet: NFT sales fell to $320 million in November — their lowest this year — with early December off to a weak start as top collections slide across the board.

title: Animoca eyes stablecoins, AI, DePIN as it expands focus in 2026: Exec
contentSnippet: Animoca Brands’ Keyvan Peymani says the Web3 gaming company is exploring all segments of the crypto industry, including DePIN, DeFi and AI.

title: Conor McGregor calls out Khabib over NFTs, gets shut down by ZachXBT
contentSnippet: The former UFC champion tried to launch his own celebrity memecoin, REAL, in April, but the project failed to gain traction.

title: Memecoin market sinks to 2025 low as $5B wiped out in a day
contentSnippet: Both memecoins and NFTs have plunged to their weakest levels since early 2025, with traders pulling back from speculative assets across the board.

title: NFT and memecoin markets recover after month-long crypto slump
contentSnippet: NFTs posted selective gains led by blue chips, while memecoins rallied broadly across major names in a sentiment-driven rebound.

title: NFTs hit the brakes: Market cap tanks 46% in just 30 days
contentSnippet: CoinGecko data shows the NFT market value has nearly halved in a month, with even top collections like BAYC and CryptoPunks losing ground.

title: Valve’s Counter-Strike 2 update crashes $5.8B economy, revives NFT debate
contentSnippet: A major update to Counter-Strike 2’s item mechanics wiped nearly $2 billion from its $5.8 billion skin market, igniting debate over central control in gaming.

title: Coinbase splashes $25M to revive a podcast from the last bull run
contentSnippet: Coinbase has paid $25 million for an NFT that compels the once popular crypto podcast UpOnly to restart. Bull market vibes anyone?

title: OpenSea rejects pivot from NFTs, says it’s evolving to ‘trade everything’
contentSnippet: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer says the platform isn’t abandoning NFTs but expanding into a universal onchain trading hub.

title: Swiss regulator GESPA takes aim at FIFA’s NFT platform in formal complaint
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s nationwide gambling authority said user rewards on the platform feature the element of chance, categorizing them as gambling.
